SAINT.Name: Virginmartyr Pelagia of Tarsus, in Asia Minor (+ c.290)
Venerable brothers Alfanov: Nikita, Cyril, Nicephorus, Clement, and Isaac, of Novgorod (14th-15th C)
Hieromartyr Erasmus the Bishop of Formia in Campania (+303)
Hieromartyr Albian the Bishop of Anaea in Asia Minor (+304)
Hieromartyr Silvanus the Bishop of Gaza, and with him 40 Martyrs (+311)
Icon of the Mother of God of Staraya Rusa (1570)
Transfer of the Relics of the Righteous Lazarus and the Holy Equal-to-the-Apostles Mary Magdalene
Venerable Martyrs of Palestine: Afrodisus, Leontius, Anthony, Valerianus, Macrobius, and others
